mapper.select: SELECT c.content_id, c.title, c.addr1, c.first_image, c.cat3, h.check_in_time, h.check_out_time, h.chkcooking, h.info_center, h.parking, h.room_count, h.subfacility, h.barbecue, h.beverage, h.campfire, h.karaoke, h.fitness, h.publicbath, h.sauna, h.refund_regulation, c.mapy, c.mapx, c.overview FROM content c JOIN hotel h ON c.content_id = h.content_id WHERE c.content_id = #{content_id}

SELECT room_id, roomtitle, offseason_minfee1, peakseason_minfee1, bath, aircondition, tv, pc, internet, refrigerator, hairdryer, img1, img2, img3, content_id FROM hotel_room WHERE content_id = ${content_id}
SELECT no, c.content_id, origin_img, thumb_img FROM content c JOIN hotel_detail_img hdi ON c.content_id = hdi.content_id WHERE c.content_id = #{content_id}

SELECT room_id, title, roomtitle, offseason_minfee1, img1, bathfacility, aircondition, tv, pc, internet, refrigerator, hairdryer, peakseason_minfee1, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM hotel_room hr JOIN content c ON hr.content_id = c.content_id JOIN hotel h ON hr.content_id = h.content_id WHERE room_id = #{room_id}
